Articles.Content:
These pics are impressive! Tempted to submit some of mine for enhancement

Are normal HD size screenshot fine?
I can work with any size.

Okay here's a couple shots that need sprucing up

Plane could use some gratuitous motion blur and faux navigation lights on wingtips. HotRockets style contrails would be nice to if its feasible to paint them on.

http://i.imgur.com/yCh6ZKB.png

The micro shuttle lighted by spotlights mounted on the launch clamps needs a bit more JJ Abrams

http://i.imgur.com/9t80XaT.png

Edited July 22, 2015 by pandoras kitten

Can you please add an upside down kerbal on EVA in the upper right hand area and spruce up the background a little bit.

Edited July 22, 2015 by Kuansenhama

Okay here's a couple shots that need sprucing up

Plane could use some gratuitous motion blur and faux navigation lights on wingtips. HotRockets style contrails would be nice to if its feasible to paint them on.

http://i.imgur.com/yCh6ZKB.png

The micro shuttle lighted by spotlights mounted on the launch clamps needs a bit more JJ Abrams

http://i.imgur.com/9t80XaT.png

Not really JJ Abrams style. I like your plane tho. Very nice.

http://i.imgur.com/2G1yvTr.png

Can you please add an upside down kerbal on EVA in the upper right hand area and spruce up the background a little bit.

Here you go.
Thank you that's perfect!

Wow! Nice work Hellblazer! Love your pictures! I took this a while back, and have been meaning to try sprucing it up myself, but to no avail. Alas, I decided to find someone with EXCEPTIONAL talent to complete what I began. I like this image because I took time adjusting the camera to find an 'on-board cam' style image. I figured it would come out better than others because the snowy white backdrop can be as valuable as the plane itself, as the subject of the image. I hate to bother you and take your time away, but I really think this image has potential. Mind if I drop it here and leave it up to you?

Much obliged

Ryan

Wow! Nice work Hellblazer! Love your pictures! I took this a while back, and have been meaning to try sprucing it up myself, but to no avail. Alas, I decided to find someone with EXCEPTIONAL talent to complete what I began. I like this image because I took time adjusting the camera to find an 'on-board cam' style image. I figured it would come out better than others because the snowy white backdrop can be as valuable as the plane itself, as the subject of the image. I hate to bother you and take your time away, but I really think this image has potential. Mind if I drop it here and leave it up to you?

Much obliged

Ryan

http://i.imgur.com/tznmOmv.jpg

Wow! Thank you so much! That looks amazing, really captures the essence of the scene! Keep up the great work man! And again, thanks so much!!

Saved it, made it my background, the lot! That was fast work, exceptional quality and seamless captivity (that sounded bad didn't it? )

I couldn't have asked for better! True class right there my friend. I hope you find much fun in doing this - you certainly make OTHERS happy!!

Edited July 22, 2015 by ryan234abc
Np and I'm glad you liked it.
Woah dude! Amazing work! You think you could give a shot at my spaceport I posted in the station showcase thread (just below you)? If you want another angle or something, just say the word.
Holy Hell (No Pun Intended) you have some great work in here Blazer. Is it all just post-processing?
I love how you touched up the plane and the micro-shuttle stack. Amazing what a little touchup can do to provide lighting atmosphere and immersion not present in current KSP engine.

Holy Hell (No Pun Intended) you have some great work in here Blazer. Is it all just post-processing?

All the screenshots have been enhanced (some more than others) with Photoshop. This is what I wish the game would look like some day......and thank you.

Woah dude! Amazing work! You think you could give a shot at my spaceport I posted in the station showcase thread (just below you)? If you want another angle or something, just say the word.

Check your PM.

Woah dude! Amazing work! You think you could give a shot at my spaceport I posted in the station showcase thread (just below you)? If you want another angle or something, just say the word.

Here you go.

Here you go.

Oh-ma-gawd... Its full of lights!

Thank you very much! The colors fits the SF style very nicely. You know what? I'll post a few others in the station thread later so you can tell me if there's another of my creations you want to work with.

How have I not heard of this place before now?!?

Can you fix up these pictures of my Typhoon class submarine? If possible, I'd like the pictures to look like they were taken during a snowstorm, with overcast/foggy skies, and maybe add a thick smoke trail and some engine light on the one with the missile launch.

I can't wait to see these when they're done...

In my signature is a link to a aircraft pack i'm making, would it be possible to get a cool pic of an air battle done? And if i leave you with the pack can you just invent a scene? Because i don't really know what i want.

Cheers.

I'll work on both of your requests. Check back in tomorrow

Edited July 27, 2015 by hellblazer

I may have some wallpaper-worthy shots but this is the first time I've 'photographed' a space station-like object, so take your pick!

In particular I'm looking for epic starship style effect for one or two of these images:

Javascript is disabled. View full album
